"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>74570</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>99ce8146-4a05-45f1-a8a3-c699162e27d4#1#5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A fénytörés törvénye</string>
            <string language="en">refraction of light</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechung des Lichtes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réfraction de lumière</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">refraction da luz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rifrazione di luce</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διάθλαση του φωτός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">refracción de la luz</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A fénytörés törvénye, a teljes visszaverődés, fénytörés a természetben, planparalel lemez, prizma</string>
            <string language="en">refraction of light</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">fénytan,  fénytörés,  teljes visszaverődés,  planparalel lemez,  prizma,  </string>
            <string language="en">optics, refraction of light, total reflection, planparallel sheet, prism  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechung des Lichtes</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réfraction de lumière</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">refraction da luz</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rifrazione di luce</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διάθλαση του φωτός</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">refracción de la luz</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Optik, Brechung des Lichtes, Gesamtreflexion, 
planparallel Blatt, Prisma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">systeme optique, réfraction de lumière, réflexion 
totale, feuille de planparallel, prisme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sistema ótico, refraction da luz, reflexão total, 
folha do planparallel, prisma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ottica, rifrazione di luce, riflessione totale, foglio 
del planparallel, prisma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η οπτική, διάθλαση της ελαφριάς, συνολικής αντανάκλασης, 
planparallel καλύπτει με σεντόνι, πρίσμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">la óptica, refracción de la luz, reflexión total, 
hoja del planparallel, prisma</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

          </typicalAgeRange>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

version:3.0
n:;
fn:

end:vcard</entity>

        </lifeCycle>

        <metaMetadata>

            </role>

        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
